enemies.title: You are not alone
enemies.description: Animals can be as helpful as dangerous. You will meet other humans too, who also try to make their way a better life. Some may be stronger than you think.
enemies.subtitle: Made of steel or made flesh, choose your opponet wisley

cards.first: Being alert at all times could mean finding abandoned weapons.
cards.second: Abandoned houses serve as shelters for zombies and wild animals.
cards.third: As night falls, everything becomes more hostile, predatory animals often come out at night.
cards.fourth: The environmental variation between these regions was so significant that we observed marked climatic changes, such as more frequent sandstorms, lower temperatures in the southern region and even snowfall. All these events had an impact on the local flora.

store.title: MERCHANDISE
store.description: Discover the official DayZ merchandise: T-shirts, hoodies and more
